title: KY Road Closures CSV Schema

District.description: KYTC divides the state into 12 geographic regions. Those areas start with District 1 in the far West and end with District 12 in the far East.

County.description: The name of the county where the event occurred. County names are all proper case.

Route.description: The route name associated with the incident.

Road_Name.description: The name of the road associated with the transportation records.

Begin_MP.description: The milepost where the event or condition begins on the road.

End_MP.description: The milepost where the event or condition ends on the road.

Comments.description: Additional comments or information related to the transportation event.
examples: This road is closed due to construction.

Reported_On.description: The date and time when the transportation event was reported. All reports are in Eastern Standard Time.

End_Date.description: The date and time when the transportation event concluded or was resolved. All reports are in Eastern Standard Time.

latitude.description: The latitude coordinate associated with the location of the transportation event.

longitude.description: The longitude coordinate associated with the location of the transportation event.

Duration_Default.description: The default duration of the transportation event. This duration value is the default output of Pandas when calculating the difference between two datetimes.

Duration_Hours.description: The duration of the transportation event in hours. This duration is used for reporting.
